模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Controller

类 SettingsController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Controller.SettingsController
public class SettingsController extends Object
The SettingsController class is a controller class for settings.fxml file to achieve MVC pattern

SettingsController controls the background music and theme color of Main.setThemeColor(String)
